title: Mathematics Job Competency Enhancement Program Based on Metacognitive Accuracy-Driven Reward System

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Mathematical Concepts and Possession of Basic Computational Skills in the Workplace
context.additional_context: A customized mathematics education course for in-service professionals, utilizing a smartphone-based simple learning record and reward management system

learning_goals: Learners achieve an 85% or higher alignment rate between metacognitive predictions (memory confidence) and actual performance outcomes
Learners can improve accuracy in solving job-related math problems by 30% compared to baseline under a reward system
Learners can reduce anxiety levels by 20% compared to pre-diagnosis during the learning process

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
